text: I know this won’t be easy, {first name}, but I also know you’ve got what it takes to get through it.
Be good to yourself, {first name}. And let others be good to you, too.
You’re being so strong—and patient, {first name}. Keep the faith. Things are going to start looking up soon.
We’ve got friends for our happiest days and saddest moments. I hope you know I’m your friend now just as much as ever.
Hi, {first name}. Just wanted to send you a smile today. Smile!
Sorry things are crappy, {first name}. If you need somebody to binge-watch a whole season of something with you, I’m there.
I believe in you, {first name}! And unicorns. But mostly you!
At a time like this, don’t even bother with a dish. Just grab a spoon and start shovelling ice cream straight from the carton.
You can get through this, {first name}. Take it from me. I’m very wise and stuff.
I know life is really tough right now, but I’m proud of the way you’re hanging in there. Keep it up, {first name}!
You may have lost the game, {first name}, but you never gave up. That makes you a winner.
What you’re going through stinks. I’ll be holding my nose along with you until things get better.
Hearts take time to heal, {first name}. Be gentle with yourself, kay?
You are so brave for speaking up about your problem, {first name}!
You’ve got it made, {first name}!
That’s good! I know you could do it, {first name}.
Good work! Keep working on it, {first name}. You’re improving!
You are doing a good job, {first name}!
That’s it, {first name}! Now you’ve figured it out.
Congratulation! You’ve passed this day!
You are getting better and better.
Nice going. You are on the right track now.
Wow! Keep up the good work, {first name}.
Terrific! Nothing can stop you now.
Right on. That’s the way to do it.
I knew you could do it, {first name}!
Good thinking! You are really improving.
Nice point, {first name}. That’s an interesting way of looking at it.
Super-Duper! That looks like it is going to be a great journal.
